channel.name: [COLOR blue]C[/COLOR][COLOR yellow]T[/COLOR][COLOR red]A[/COLOR] ** [COLOR red]POLICIAS EN EL CORAZON DE LA CALLE[/COLOR][COLOR yellow] temporada[/COLOR][COLOR blue] 1[/COLOR] **

regex.name: get-source-page
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import requests import re import time url ='http://powvideo.net/sto11zxa5rg4' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:41.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/41.0 Iceweasel/41.0.2'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) cookie1 = source.cookies['__cfduid'] id = re.findall('id" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] op = re.findall('op" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] fname = re.findall('fname" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] imhuman = re.findall('imhuman".*value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] usr_login = re.findall('usr_login" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] hash = re.findall('hash" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] referer = re.findall('referer" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] time.sleep(10) cookie = {'__cfduid': cookie1} data = {'op': op, 'usr_login': usr_login, 'id': id, 'fname': fname, 'referer': referer, 'hash': hash, 'imhuman': imhuman} r1 = requests.post(url, headers = headers, data= data, cookies=cookie) return r1.text

items.item:
[COLOR blue]C[/COLOR][COLOR yellow]T[/COLOR][COLOR red]A[/COLOR] ** [COLOR lime]POLICIAS[/COLOR][COLOR yellow] 2-6[/COLOR] ** $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<title>[COLOR blue]C[/COLOR][COLOR yellow]T[/COLOR][COLOR red]A[/COLOR] ** [COLOR lime] [makelist.param3][/COLOR] **</title> <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link> <thumbnail>http://descargardvd.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/12684030491685201.jpg</thumbnail> (AQUI EL LOGO O FRONTAL DE LA IMAGEN) <fanart>http://nubeo.nubeox.com/images/340026/21.jpg</fanart> (AQUI LA IMAGEN DE FONDO)
href="\/.*,(.*?),list.*\n.*\n.*\n.*href="\/([^"]*)".*?>(.*?)< http://diskokosmiko.mx/ader/policias-2-6-34557 AQUI LA DERECCION DEL SERVIDOR
getUrl DownloadUrl":"([^"]+) http://diskokosmiko.mx/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=[makelist.param1] fileId=[makelist.param1]&__RequestVerificationToken=$doregex[tok] http://diskokosmiko.mx/[makelist.param2] keep-alive */* XMLHttpRequest
tok DownloadFile.*RequestVerificationToken.*?value="([^"]+) http://diskokosmiko.mx/[makelist.param2] http://diskokosmiko.mx/ader/policias-2-6-34557 AQUI LA DERECCION DEL SERVIDOR keep-alive
http://descargardvd.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/12684030491685201.jpg (AQUI EL LOGO O FRONTAL DE LA IMAGEN) http://nubeo.nubeox.com/images/340026/21.jpg (AQUI LA IMAGEN DE FONDO)

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import requests import re import time url ='http://powvideo.net/ltzyfwdhvsyx' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:41.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/41.0 Iceweasel/41.0.2'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) cookie1 = source.cookies['__cfduid'] id = re.findall('id" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] op = re.findall('op" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] fname = re.findall('fname" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] imhuman = re.findall('imhuman".*value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] usr_login = re.findall('usr_login" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] hash = re.findall('hash" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] referer = re.findall('referer" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] time.sleep(10) cookie = {'__cfduid': cookie1} data = {'op': op, 'usr_login': usr_login, 'id': id, 'fname': fname, 'referer': referer, 'hash': hash, 'imhuman': imhuman} r1 = requests.post(url, headers = headers, data= data, cookies=cookie) return r1.text

[COLOR blue]C[/COLOR][COLOR yellow]T[/COLOR][COLOR red]A[/COLOR] ** [COLOR lime]POLICIAS[/COLOR][COLOR yellow] 4-11[/COLOR] ** $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<title>[COLOR blue]C[/COLOR][COLOR yellow]T[/COLOR][COLOR red]A[/COLOR] ** [COLOR lime] [makelist.param3][/COLOR] **</title> <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link> <thumbnail>http://descargardvd.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/12684030491685201.jpg</thumbnail> (AQUI EL LOGO O FRONTAL DE LA IMAGEN) <fanart>http://nubeo.nubeox.com/images/340026/21.jpg</fanart> (AQUI LA IMAGEN DE FONDO)
href="\/.*,(.*?),list.*\n.*\n.*\n.*href="\/([^"]*)".*?>(.*?)< http://diskokosmiko.mx/ader/policias-4-11-34568 AQUI LA DERECCION DEL SERVIDOR
getUrl DownloadUrl":"([^"]+) http://diskokosmiko.mx/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=[makelist.param1] fileId=[makelist.param1]&__RequestVerificationToken=$doregex[tok] http://diskokosmiko.mx/[makelist.param2] keep-alive */* XMLHttpRequest
tok DownloadFile.*RequestVerificationToken.*?value="([^"]+) http://diskokosmiko.mx/[makelist.param2] http://diskokosmiko.mx/ader/policias-4-11-34568 AQUI LA DERECCION DEL SERVIDOR keep-alive

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import requests import re import time url ='http://powvideo.net/qjrqm6vn6vfy' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:41.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/41.0 Iceweasel/41.0.2'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) cookie1 = source.cookies['__cfduid'] id = re.findall('id" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] op = re.findall('op" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] fname = re.findall('fname" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] imhuman = re.findall('imhuman".*value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] usr_login = re.findall('usr_login" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] hash = re.findall('hash" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] referer = re.findall('referer" value="(.*?)"', source.text)[0] time.sleep(10) cookie = {'__cfduid': cookie1} data = {'op': op, 'usr_login': usr_login, 'id': id, 'fname': fname, 'referer': referer, 'hash': hash, 'imhuman': imhuman} r1 = requests.post(url, headers = headers, data= data, cookies=cookie) return r1.text

items.item:
[COLOR blue]C[/COLOR][COLOR yellow]T[/COLOR][COLOR red]A[/COLOR] ** [COLOR lime]POLICIAS[/COLOR][COLOR yellow] 6-5[/COLOR] ** $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<title>[COLOR blue]C[/COLOR][COLOR yellow]T[/COLOR][COLOR red]A[/COLOR] ** [COLOR lime] [makelist.param3][/COLOR] **</title> <link>$doregex[getUrl]</link> <thumbnail>http://descargardvd.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/12684030491685201.jpg</thumbnail> (AQUI EL LOGO O FRONTAL DE LA IMAGEN) <fanart>http://nubeo.nubeox.com/images/340026/21.jpg</fanart> (AQUI LA IMAGEN DE FONDO)
href="\/.*,(.*?),list.*\n.*\n.*\n.*href="\/([^"]*)".*?>(.*?)< http://diskokosmiko.mx/ader/policias-6-5-34638 AQUI LA DERECCION DEL SERVIDOR
getUrl DownloadUrl":"([^"]+) http://diskokosmiko.mx/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=[makelist.param1] fileId=[makelist.param1]&__RequestVerificationToken=$doregex[tok] http://diskokosmiko.mx/[makelist.param2] keep-alive */* XMLHttpRequest
tok DownloadFile.*RequestVerificationToken.*?value="([^"]+) http://diskokosmiko.mx/[makelist.param2] http://diskokosmiko.mx/ader/policias-6-5-34638 AQUI LA DERECCION DEL SERVIDOR keep-alive
